reviewtext: I just got my new intellimouse optical today and I am already sold on it. I was so tired of cleaning the ball on my convential mouse. I love the way this one just glides on the desk with total control. I am also sold on the side buttons for forward and back, what a great invention! This mouse makes the computer and internet a whole new experience. And I look forward to not needing to drag out the alcohol and q-tips every other week. I highly recommend this product!! Give it a try, you will not be sorry.
